name: ragstack-lambda
description: Serverless OCR-to-Knowledge Base pipeline on AWS

scripts.lint: uv run ruff check . --fix && uv run ruff format .
scripts.lint:frontend: cd src/ui && npm run lint -- --fix && cd ../ragstack-chat && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: uv run pytest tests/unit/python/ -m 'not integration' -v --tb=short && cd src/ui && npm test -- --run && cd ../ragstack-chat && npm test -- --run
scripts.test:frontend: cd src/ui && npm test -- --run && cd ../ragstack-chat && npm test -- --run
scripts.check: npm run lint:all && npm run test
